last_commits: ab71173 feat(waitlist): add hero waitlist UI + serverless stub
7658f98 feat: Transform fintech template into VistaForge frontend with Supabase integration

security_issues_found.description: Contains hardcoded Supabase URL and anon key as fallbacks
security_issues_found.recommendation: Remove hardcoded credentials and rely on environment variables only

vercel_config_issues.description: vercel.json references @vite_supabase_url and @vite_supabase_anon_key secrets that don't exist
vercel_config_issues.solution: Create secrets in Vercel dashboard or update vercel.json to use direct environment variables

required_actions.alternative: Set environment variables directly in Vercel dashboard: VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY

required_actions.description: Remove fallback hardcoded values to prevent credential exposure

build_analysis.bundle_size_warning: Some chunks larger than 500 kB - consider code splitting
build_analysis.vulnerabilities: 7 vulnerabilities (3 low, 4 moderate) - run npm audit fix

notes: The project builds successfully locally but will fail on Vercel due to missing secrets. The main issue is that vercel.json references secrets (@vite_supabase_url, @vite_supabase_anon_key) that don't exist in Vercel. Additionally, there are hardcoded credentials in src/lib/supabase.ts that should be removed for security. No service role keys were found in client-side code, which is good. The waitlist functionality is properly implemented with server-side secret handling.
